name: jaeger-client

scripts.check-ls: npm ls --loglevel=http --parseable 1>/dev/null && echo '# npm is in a good state'
scripts.lint: eslint $(ls src/ | grep '.js$') && echo '# linter passed' && npm run check-license
scripts.test-all: npm run test-core && npm run test-samplers && npm run test-crossdock && npm run test-baggage

scripts.check-ls: npm ls --loglevel=http --parseable 1>/dev/null && echo '# npm is in a good state'
scripts.lint: eslint $(ls src/ | grep '.js$') && echo '# linter passed'
scripts.test: npm run flow & npm run lint && ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register

scripts.check-ls: npm ls --loglevel=http --parseable 1>/dev/null && echo '# npm is in a good state'
scripts.compile: babel --presets es2015 --plugins transform-class-properties -d dist/src/ src/ && cp package.json dist/
scripts.lint: eslint $(ls src/ | grep '.js$') && echo '# linter passed'
scripts.test: npm run flow & npm run lint && ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register

scripts.lint: eslint $(ls src/ | grep '.js$') && echo '# linter passed'
scripts.lint-ci: npm run lint && echo '# TODO: ADD npm run check-license'
scripts.test-ci: npm run test && npm run lint-ci
scripts.test-all: npm run test-core && npm run test-samplers && npm run test-crossdock && npm run test-baggage

scripts.check-ls: npm ls --loglevel=http --parseable 1>/dev/null && echo '# npm is in a good state'
scripts.cover: babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- test/ test/samplers/ test/baggage/ test/throttler/ test/metrics/
scripts.lint: eslint $(ls src/ | grep '.js$') && echo '# linter passed' && npm run check-license
scripts.test-dist: mocha dist/test/ dist/test/baggage/ dist/test/throttler/ dist/test/samplers/ dist/test/metrics/
scripts.test-all: npm run test-core && npm run test-samplers && npm run test-crossdock && npm run test-baggage && npm run test-throttler && npm run test-prom-metrics
